# 四女神星

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/sinvshenxing
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/sinvshenxing
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install sinvshenxing
sinvshenxing <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g sinvshenxing
sinvshenxing <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
